name: University of Barcelona
visaRiskNotes: Student visa decisions depend on finances, credible study plan, and documentation quality, therefore scrutiny can rise for higher cost cities and weak profiles.

name: Autonomous University of Barcelona
visaRiskNotes: Visa assessment can be strict on proof of funds and academic rationale, therefore weak documentation increases refusal risk.

name: Pompeu Fabra University
visaRiskNotes: Higher priced masters and premium programs can attract additional financial scrutiny, therefore ensure funds and program fit are well evidenced.

name: Autonomous University of Madrid
visaRiskNotes: Madrid living costs and accommodation proof are frequently examined, therefore weak housing and funding evidence raises risk.

name: Complutense University of Madrid
visaRiskNotes: Visa officers may question program language fit if most teaching is local language, therefore only select clearly English taught tracks.

name: Carlos III University of Madrid
visaRiskNotes: Some masters have higher “special” prices and can trigger financial scrutiny, therefore budget proof must match total cost.

name: Polytechnic University of Madrid
visaRiskNotes: Technical programs can be demanding and visa credibility hinges on academic preparedness, therefore weak academics can be questioned.

name: Polytechnic University of Catalonia
visaRiskNotes: Barcelona costs plus technical workload require strong financial plan, therefore avoid tight budgets.

name: University of Valencia
visaRiskNotes: Visa review focuses on funds and intent, therefore ensure a consistent story tying program to career.

name: Polytechnic University of Valencia
visaRiskNotes: Some programs require strong quantitative background, therefore weak alignment can hurt both admissions and visa credibility.

name: University of Granada
visaRiskNotes: Lower cost cities can help budgets, however visa still requires full documented funds and insurance.

name: University of Seville
visaRiskNotes: For partially English programs, visa officers may question language ability, therefore confirm the teaching language in writing.

name: University of Zaragoza
visaRiskNotes: Smaller city does not reduce documentation demands, therefore keep financial and academic evidence strong.

name: University of the Basque Country
visaRiskNotes: Basque region programs may mix languages, therefore confirm English delivery and assessment language before applying.

name: University of Deusto
visaRiskNotes: Private tuition can increase financial scrutiny, therefore show clear funding and ROI rationale without exaggeration.

name: University of Navarra
visaRiskNotes: Premium private programs require stronger funding proof, therefore avoid loan heavy profiles without strong co funding evidence.

name: IE University
visaRiskNotes: High tuition and living costs can trigger strict financial review, therefore documentation must be complete and consistent.

name: Ramon Llull University
visaRiskNotes: This is a university level umbrella that includes schools with varying language and selectivity, therefore confirm the specific school and program language.

name: ESADE Ramon Llull University
visaRiskNotes: Very high cost means strong funding evidence is essential, therefore weak finances can raise visa risk.

name: ESADE Business School
visaRiskNotes: Premium fee programs face higher scrutiny for genuine student intent, therefore keep documentation strong and credible.

name: EADA Business School Barcelona
visaRiskNotes: Smaller private schools can attract extra scrutiny if the profile looks migration driven, therefore ensure academic fit and funding clarity.

name: University of Salamanca
visaRiskNotes: Many programs are Spanish taught, therefore only select confirmed English tracks to avoid language issues.

name: University of Alicante
visaRiskNotes: English track availability can be limited by department, therefore confirm the program language and assessment rules.

name: University of Murcia
visaRiskNotes: For mixed language degrees, visa officers may question language preparedness, therefore ensure IELTS and program language proof.

name: University of Alcalá
visaRiskNotes: Mixed language delivery needs careful confirmation, therefore avoid assumptions based on faculty reputation alone.

name: Universidad Europea de Madrid
visaRiskNotes: Private institutions with broad admissions can face higher scrutiny, therefore weak academics and unclear intent can raise refusal risk.
